action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:
ANSWER: your answer
action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows a classroom with rows of old-style desktop computers on wooden desks. There are several chairs, a green chalkboard on the wall, and a microwave on a shelf. The room has wooden paneling and a window on the left side.

ANSWER: The classroom has rows of old-style desktop computers on desks, with chairs in front of each. The desks are arranged in two parallel rows. There is a green chalkboard on the wall at the front of the room.
action.label: response

answer: the classroom has rows of old-style desktop computers on desks, with chairs in front of each. the desks are arranged in two parallel rows. there is a green chalkboard on the wall at the front of the room
